Project: Robo AI Digest (formerly ainews)

Description

World-class AI news portal focusing on unique English insights, built with Quarto and R. Fully automated daily scouting and publishing engine delivering “Signal over Noise”.

Tech Stack

  • Quarto
  • R
  • CSS (Dark AI Theme)
  • MiniMax M2.5 (Primary Author Engine)
  • Pollinations.ai (AI Image Generation) - CURRENTLY DOWN
  • Netlify (Hosting & Forms)
  • Brave Search API (Deep Research)
  • Klaro (Cookie Consent)

TODOs

Cron Jobs

Schedule Script Purpose
0 8 * * * Cron ID: 05094f68… Daily scout - 08:00
45 8 * * * Cron ID: b0436a40… Daily scout - 08:45
15 10 * * * Cron ID: 74034b49… Daily scout - 10:15

Event Log

2026-02-14

  • Cron Fix: Old cron had invalid format 0 8,45 8,15 10 * * *. Removed and created 3 new crons: 08:00, 08:45, 10:15 (all using MiniMax-M2.5)

  • New Publications:

    • Gemini 3 Deep Think (subagent published)
    • xAI Interplanetary Ambitions
    • Transformers.js v5 (recreated - file was empty)

  • Image Fixes:

    • Fixed broken images (local .jpg/.png) - changed to Pollinations.ai URLs
    • Fixed nofollow links (spacing issue: {rel="nofollow"} → {rel="nofollow"})
    • Fixed published_topics.json (missing comma)
    • Fixed image URLs: image.pollinations.ai/prompt/ → pollinations.ai/p/

  • Issue: Pollinations.ai currently returns HTTP 530 - service down

  • Cookie Consent: Added Klaro (klaro-config.js + klaro-head.html)

  • Cron Maintenance: Fixed invalid cron schedule expression that caused missed morning updates. Verified new schedule (08:00, 08:45, 10:15) is active and working.

  • Manual Recovery: Triggered manual scout/publish session to recover missed morning news.

  • New Publications:

    • MiniMax M2.5 Release: Deep dive into the “intelligence too cheap to meter” model, SOTA agentic performance (80.2% SWE-bench), and Forge RL framework.
    • Hugging Face Transformers.js v5: Major update with enhanced WebGPU support.
    • OpenEnv: New agent evaluation framework for interactive environment testing.

  • System Cleanup: Fixed Quarto rendering warnings related to missing post metadata.

  • Model Verification: Confirmed all automated tasks are correctly using Gemini 3 Flash via OpenRouter.

2026-02-11

  • New Publications: Generated 3 unique posts with double-fact checking via web sources:
    • Transformers.js v4: Hugging Face’s major WebGPU runtime rewrite enabling local AI inference in browsers, Node.js, and Deno
    • xAI Founding Exodus: Half of xAI’s founding team (6 of 12) departed, including Jimmy Ba and Tony Wu
    • Agent World Model: Snowflake Labs’ synthetic environment generation pipeline for scalable agent RL training
  • Deduplication Check: Validated against published_topics.json - no duplicate topics detected
  • Sources Used: Hugging Face Blog, Bloomberg, CNBC, arXiv, Financial Times
  • Automation: Published via cron (08:00) with MiniMax M2.1 author engine
  • Live: All 3 posts committed to GitHub (2436eb5)

2026-02-10

  • New Publications: Generated 3 unique posts with double-fact checking via web sources:
    • ByteDance Protenix-v1: Open-source AlphaFold3-level biomolecular structure model
    • Microsoft OrbitalBrain: Distributed ML training on satellite constellations
    • OAT: Ordered Action Tokenization for robotics (Harvard/Stanford)
  • Image Integration: Migrated to external Pollinations.ai URLs for reliable image rendering
  • Model Update: Primary author engine switched to MiniMax M2.1
  • Deployment Fix: Netlify was skipping Quarto build (3s deploy time). Fixed by committing rendered _site/ folder to GitHub for direct CDN deployment
  • Live: All 3 posts now visible at roboaidigest.com (commit 4a02ce7)
  • SEO Improvements:
    • Added OG/Twitter Card meta tags via header-includes
    • Added robots and googlebot meta tags
    • Moved keywords from frontmatter to header-includes (global only)
    • Created hide-elements.css to hide keywords section and footer from posts
    • Added rel=“nofollow” to all external links
    • Enabled canonical-url: true for automatic canonical tags
    • Extended meta description to 156 characters
    • Added pagetagline: “Robo AI Digest - AI News, Machine Learning & Technology”
    • Removed redundant “Home” link from navbar
    • Added fig-alt attributes to all post images
    • Homepage SEO audit score: 74/100 (improvements applied)

2026-02-08

  • Reporting Service Status: Verified Financial Sentiment Check status via Heartbeat (PL source stale).
  • Brave API Integration: Configured Brave Search API key for enhanced web research capabilities.
  • Breaking News Coverage: Published a technical update on the rumored “Grok 4.2” release by xAI, including AI-generated imagery and deep research into xAI documentation.
  • Bug Fix (Rendering): Fixed a system-wide issue where nofollow parameters were incorrectly rendered as text in Quarto posts due to trailing spaces in markdown syntax.
  • Rebranding: Successfully rebranded the project from “ainews” to “Robo AI Digest”.
  • Domain: Purchased and connected official domain roboaidigest.com.
  • Infrastructure: Switched Git authentication from HTTPS to SSH for reliable automated pushes.
  • Automation Enrichment: Integrated AI image generation using Pollinations.ai API for all new posts.
  • Privacy & Security: Removed all raw email addresses from public pages and Git history; excluded PROJECT_LOG.md from repository.
  • Engagement: Implemented a Netlify-backed contact form on the About page.
  • Deployment: Configured netlify.toml for local-render-only builds and verified deployment on Netlify.

2026-02-07

  • Upgraded primary author engine to Gemini 3 Flash for better analysis and phrasing.
  • Registered project in MEMORY.md and formatted project logs using pmem skill.
  • Successfully performed manual daily update and verified cron automation.
  • Implemented Deduplication System: Created data/published_topics.json to track topics and prevent repetitive content. Added “Validation & Update” step to automation requirements.
  • Verified historical posts and initialized topic database with today’s and yesterday’s entries.
  • Synchronized heartbeat tasks to enforce deduplication check before każdą publikacją.

2026-02-06

  • Project initialized at /home/skutek/projekty/ainews.
  • Implemented Dark AI Theme and Quarto structure.
  • Established legal pages (Privacy/Terms).
